collection.name: Sahih Muslim
collection.description: Sahih Muslim is a collection of hadith compiled by Imam Muslim ibn al-Hajjaj al-Naysaburi (rahimahullah). His collection is considered one of the most authentic collections of the Sunnah of the Prophet (ﷺ), and along with Sahih al-Bukhari forms the 'Sahihain,' or the 'Two Sahihs.' It contains roughly 7500 hadith (with repetitions) in 57 books.
